Hero.subtitle: Children's innovative center for creativity and development
Hero.benefit1: Professional teachers with 7+ years of experience

About.title: About us
About.text1: Academ Kids is a creativity and development club for children aged 5 to 14.
About.text2: More than 150 winners of national and international olympiads and competitions.
About.text3: Professional teachers, individual approach to each child, and only modern teaching methods.
About.motto: We develop talents and inspire success!

AboutPage.heroDescription: A place where every child unlocks their potential through creativity, play, and the joy of learning
AboutPage.storyTitle: Building the future together with children

AboutValues.individualDesc: We take into account the unique traits of each child
AboutValues.playLearningDesc: We teach through play and creativity
